price: 61. Tokkel namma butta (firqawni maraa kee Muusâ mara kinnuk) sitta tuble waqdi, Nabii Muusâ kataysis:diggah nanu elel simneeh firqwnaa kee kay macxi nee qide-le iyyen.
arabic: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā tarāā al-jamʿāni qāla aṣḥābu mūsā innā lamud'rakūna
